entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 7.2°C

Visibility: 80.5 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
